constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SIRES:
H.R. 159.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to clause 3(d) (1) of rule XIII of the Rules of
the House of Representatives, the Committee find the
authority for this legislation in article I, section 8 of the
Constitution.
[Page H55]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

title: Community Parks Revitalization Act
